column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here with our small group and had a selection of food to share (obviously since its a tapas place).  I've been to much better
column2: but of course they were in San Francisco!  Otherwise
column4: and the food was good.  Great to come with a group and have fun.  We had potatoes
column8: and several other items (I can't remember) but all were good!
